Intensive course on data analysis with linear models, GLMs, and mixed models at Universidad Mayor de San Andrés (UMSA), La Paz, Bolivia, 23 - 24 Feb, and Universidad Mayor de San Simón (UMSS), Cochabamba, Bolivia, 6 - 8 Mar. With support from R Consortium.
